amendatorysection.para: Whenever damages are recoverable, the plaintiff may claim and recover any rate of damages to which he may be entitled for the cause of action established.

annotation.para: Public perceptions of a defect when the evidence demonstrates there is none is an improper basis for recovery. de Vries v. L & L Custom Builders, 310 Neb. 543, 968 N.W.2d 64 (2021).
